headline: Evaluating Vistra After a 17% Stock Pullback and Recent Market Volatility
summary: Curious whether Vistra is a bargain, overpriced, or something in between? You are not alone. Figuring out the real value of a stock is what keeps investors up at night, and we are diving right in. Vistra’s stock has certainly kept things interesting lately, with a huge 701.6% gain over three years, but a recent 17.1% drop in the past month shows just how quickly sentiment can shift. That sharp pullback follows increased market buzz around utility stocks as investors react to changing energy...

headline: Can Vistra's (VST) Nuclear Deal and Earnings Guidance Reshape Its Long-Term Growth Narrative?
summary: Vistra Corp. recently announced its third quarter 2025 earnings results, issued earnings guidance for 2025 and 2026 projecting US$1.74 billion to US$1.89 billion in net income for 2025 and US$3.01 billion to US$3.64 billion for 2026, reported US$5 million in asset impairments, and provided an update on its ongoing share buyback program. Alongside its financial disclosures, the company entered into a 20-year nuclear power purchase agreement, reflecting a shift toward carbon-free energy and...
